class.name: Event
class.desc:
Creates a new event to be used in the event messaging system.
This is exactly the same type as the :class:`pygame2.sdl.event.Event` class. Take a look at its documentation for more details.

attr.name: name
attr.desc: Gets the name of the Event.

attr.name: type
attr.desc: Gets type id of the Event.

func.name: get
func.desc: Gets the events from the event queue.
